price: 39. Kaadu dulmi ken xage kaa tekkek usun ken yudlume maral cane gacsitaah koosita mara kinnon caddok keenit tatre kalah Yallih gital.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَابَهُمُ ٱلۡبَغۡيُ هُمۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna idhā aṣābahumu al-baghyu hum yantaṣirūna
